summary: An improvement for the mountains and rocks textures for those who prefer the skyrim vanilla style.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LNnqIcv.jpg[/IMG][/center]

---------------------
INTRODUCTION
---------------------

This is my fist attempt with textures.

At first this was a mod i made for my personal use after testing a lot of different mountain/rocks textures. While there are awesome mountains and rocks textures here on Nexus, only a few are \"vanilla-friendly\", and as i prefer the vanilla style of mountain textures i was never really satisfied with the texture mods.
While doing this retexture i tought: \"Well... maybe someone prefer the vanilla mountain texture style like me, so... [b]WHY NOT SHARE?![/b]

That\'s it!

----------------
WHAT I DID 
----------------

As this is my first texture project and im far from an expert with textures, the texture is far from perfect... but i can assure you i lost some time to tune it the best i could.

As i dont have the skill to do a proper retexture from the ground up, i used the vanilla texture as a base and then applied a high detailed texture overlay i made and fine tuned. The same applies to the normal map.
While this sounds as just an enlargement with a texture overlay, it was not that simple. I tweaked the texture and normal map a LOT to make it look as detailed as possible while maintaining the vanilla look as intact as possible. In other words... [b]A deep balance between realism and style[/b]

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gwPAv67.jpg[/IMG][/center]

--------------------------------
FOR WHO IS THIS MOD
--------------------------------

Basically for everybody, but mainly for who prefers to keep the vanilla style intact.

----------------
TOLERANCE
----------------

As i said before, this is my first attempt with textures (im far from an expert), so i hope you understand that i decided to release this mod so you can have [b]\"the benefit of choice\"[/b] between all the mountain/rocks texture mods on Nexus.

[b][u]Test before judging![/u][/b]

I will not tolerate insults, rant, flame wars!!!

On the other hand... constructive critics will be highly appreciated!

-------------------------------
TEXTURE RESOLUTION
-------------------------------

The textures are at 2048x2048, which in my opinion is the best balance between Quality x VRAM consumption for most computers.

I will consider making a 1K and 4K versions later and maybe a darker version.

--------------------
INSTALLATION
--------------------

Just extract the content to Skyrim main folder (where the TESV.exe is located)

------------------------------
MY OTHER MODS
------------------------------

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32505/]Skyrim Project Optimization[/url]: What it does is to use occlusions to optimize and improve performance on interiors .

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29253/]Remove Interior Fog V2[/url]: What it does is to remove the ambient fog on all interiors, making them darker and more realistic.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40937]Solitude dragonhead HD[/url]: A texture improvement for the Solitude dragonhead.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41053/]Salmon Texture HD[/url]: A retexture of the Salmon fish.


[b]DONT FORGET TO ENDORSE IF YOU LIKE![/b]
author: rgabriel15
